Name: Pimm's Cocktail
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.
Review: Luxuriate in this quintessentially English tipple.
History: See our Fruit Cups and Pimm's page for more information.
Nutrition: One serving of Pimm's Cocktail contains 199 calories
Garnish: Lemon & orange zest twists (discarded) & strawberry on rim
